title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Skills: Simulation-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of college-level basic calculus and linear algebra
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can transform real-life problems into mathematical models and propose solutions through simulation.
Learners can perform data-driven decision-making by analyzing simulation results.
Learners can complete a project solving complex mathematical problems through collaboration with team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
